HDG.FS.content: Heidegger learned from Hölderlin uselessness of coining new words > information technology robbing language of its proper laws, mere instrument (Werkzeug) of information > [Heideggerian imperative] “untiringly work outside of all publicness (Öffentlichkeit) to keep alive (lebendig zu bewahren) a thinking that is attentive to being (ein dem Sein achtsames Denken)”: lay foundation (begründen) for distant future (ferne Zukunft), possibility of tradition (Überlieferung) [to come, arrival?]

HDG.DL.content: in Japanese, mystery is a mystery when it doesn’t come out that mystery is at work (waltet) [reigns?] [those in a hurry will never notice, slow down] > to guard purity of mystery’s wellspring, hardest of all > but we must incessantly strive to speak about (über) language, though almost (fast) inevitably such speaking turns language into an object (Gegenstand) > p. 51 that would be a position above language, wouldn’t hear from it, would only speak from language

HDG.EC.content: nationality: pure subjectivity of a people, relies on its “Nature” as what’s actual (Wirkliche), and all effecting (Wirken) comes from and goes back to this “Nature” > in subjectivity, man asserts himself as ground/measure of what’s actual > thus emerges (entspringt) the uprising (Aufstand) into work as form of achievement through which devastation of earth becomes unconditional [in German one more sentence than in English: Das einzige Gesetz der Verwüstung ist, dass das Nötige das Nötigste und das allein Nötige sei] > business of devastation: work for sake of increased possibility of work [Marxish?]

HDG.OHF.content: (formal indication) forehaving of Dasein = being-there of Dasein (factical life) is being in a world > the success of such a demonstration (Ausweisung) doesn’t say anything primordial about forehaving, is only a phenomenon of another forehaving lying further back (already at work in our descriptions) [infinite regress of forehaving, no arrival?] [but Heidegger stresses this being in a world only a formal indication, we must follow its indefiniteness to the right path of looking (rechte Blickbahn), by way of intuition?]
